quoteText: For example, when you search for something on Facebook, you can access and delete that query from within your search history at any time, but the log of that search is deleted after 6 months.
title: This service keeps user logs for an undefined period of time

tosdr.case: This service keeps user logs for an undefined period of time
tosdr.tldr: This is just an example and they vaguely state that every action might have different log times, without explicitly stating how long they will keep the logs.
